trans-unit.source: Push notifications in Azure Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Push notifications in Azure Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section provide information about configuring push notifications in <token>firstref_zumo</token>.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section provide information about configuring push notifications in <token>firstref_zumo</token>.

trans-unit.source: This same content is available as help in the <token>firstref_azportal</token>.
trans-unit.target: This same content is available as help in the <token>firstref_azportal</token>.

trans-unit.source: For more general information about <token>nextref_zumo</token> and examples of how to use <token>nextref_zumo</token> in your apps, see <externalLink><linkText>Mobile Services Tutorials and Resources</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=266220</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more general information about <token>nextref_zumo</token> and examples of how to use <token>nextref_zumo</token> in your apps, see <externalLink><linkText>Mobile Services Tutorials and Resources</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=266220</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to configure push notifications in the <token>nextref_azportal</token>.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to configure push notifications in the <token>nextref_azportal</token>.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to set access to the registration endpoint and inject business logic into the registration operation.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to set access to the registration endpoint and inject business logic into the registration operation.

trans-unit.source: Show an example of how to send a push notification from a server script.
trans-unit.target: Show an example of how to send a push notification from a server script.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to upgrade a <token>nextref_zumo</token> application to use Azure Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to upgrade a <token>nextref_zumo</token> application to use Azure Notification Hubs.
